item.title: DNSProvider and DNSEntry resources
item.description: Contract: DNSProvider and DNSEntry resources Every shoot cluster requires external DNS records that are publicly resolvable. The management of these DNS records requires provider-specific knowledge which is to be developed outside of the Gardener’s core repository. What does Gardener create DNS records for? Internal domain name Every shoot cluster’s kube-apiserver running in the seed is exposed via a load balancer that has a public endpoint (IP or hostname).
